channel.title: org on Garden
channel.description: Recent content in org on Garden

item.title: org-mode cheat-sheet
item.description: line breaks # Enter twice. It renders <p>line</p><p>line</p> line1 line2 Insert ‘\\’ end of line. It renders <p>line<br>line<p/> line1 line2 Inline code block # Wrap code with ~ ~code~ It shown as code Wrap code with = =code= It shown as code Code block # <C-c> <C-,> s [ #+begin_src <language> ] code [ #+end_src ] Example # To ignore special syntax. <C-c> <C-,> e Notes: Insert comma before [ * | ,* | #+ | ,#+ ].
